descriptionarticle.text: Denominator of the fraction of image scaling.

return.text: Scale the image by the fraction

/Scale_denom. Default is 1/1, or no scaling. Currently, the only supported scaling ratios are 1/1, 1/2, 1/4, and 1/8. (The library design allows for arbitrary scaling ratios but this is not likely to be implemented any time soon.)
